description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21338):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB update based on your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog links below.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
-  For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
-  For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
-  For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)

This update resolves the kernel vulnerability allowing local privilege escalation, impacting the security of the operating system.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running the specified Windows version mentioned above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
